name: market for mine infrastructure, phosphate rock | mine infrastructure, phosphate rock | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/5804/documentation

This is a market activity. In the case of services or immobile infrastructures, markets are connecting suppliers and consumers at a global level. For specific connections at regional level, direct links between the local producing activities and the local consumers are preferred. Transport or losses are logically not relevant for this type of products.;This is the market for  'mine infrastructure, phosphate rock', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This is an immobile infrastructure, representing the construction of a mine infrastructure, phosphate rock. The infrastructure represents a small size plant with 20,000 m2 per Mt annual production of beneficiated phosphate rock and a lifetime of 20 years. The process includes mining equipment, equipment for beneficiation, buildings for beneficiation plant, land use of processing pant.

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/429:Construction of other civil engineering projects/4290:Construction of other civil engineering projects
tags: Sector: Infrastructure & Machinery; Resource Extraction; Minerals
